# rawTagValue

**Instance Property**

The tag’s contained value.

## Declaration

```swift
final let rawTagValue: CMTag.Value
```

## Inspecting Tags

- **rawCategory**: The raw 64-bit representation of the tag’s category.
- **value(onlyIfMatching:)**: Retrieves a tag’s value as a specific type, if and only if it matches a category.

items.description: The raw 64-bit representation of the tag’s category.
